--- In gladiator@y..., Tom Tildrum <tevildoii@y...> wrote:
> The reason that golems, giant skeletons, and towers
> can't be hybridised in your theoretical system is that
> they're unhireable, yes?

That's the right.

My favorite hybrid would be an archer/slime where I can keep the grow 
ability.  I could grow to maximum size and switch to using exploding 
bolts without worrying about killing the character for a while.  When 
I get to the smallest size, I just switch back to grow to get back to 
maximum size.

> Has anyone done any work on a new tile set for the
> giant skeleton? Does the program need a patch if the
> new tile set is to have forward-facing and
> backward-facing tiles that actually work?
      -Tevildo, Prince of Cats.

Actually, I have a list of implementable changes to the game.  That 
change is in phase 1.
